name: Coffee Udders
description: Ah! Calf-feine really keeps me awake! This upgrade makes stamina regenerate +10A faster.

name: Hoof Shine
description: Can’t click well if your hooves aren’t spruced up! This upgrade +10A more mooney to each click!

name: Side Hustle
description: Let’s start a smool business! This should generate +10A per minute even while I’m not clicking.
